Package se.arkalix.query

Class ServiceQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • se.arkalix.query.ServiceQuery
  • public class ServiceQuery
extends java.lang.Object
    A description of an Arrowhead service some ArSystem wishes to consume.

    The class is meant to be used as follows:

    1. An instance is created using ArSystem.consume().
    2. The methods of this class are used to specify as much information as is required for relevant services to be resolved by the resolver function provided at instance creation. How much information is required will depend on the used resolution strategy, which might vary from just the name of the service to all possible details about it.
    3. One out of the methods using(), resolveAll() and resolveOne() are used to complete the query and start service resolution. If the using() method is used, the provided factory automatically provides additional details to the query before it is executed. Make sure to read the documentation for the ArConsumerFactory you want to use with that method in order to be certain about what details will be automatically provided. ArConsumerFactory classes representing specific Arrowhead services typically require no query information to be explicitly specified at all.

      • using

        public <C extends ArConsumer> Future<C> using​(ArConsumerFactory<C> factory)
        Uses provided factory to (1) add additional details to this query, (2) resolve the query, and then (3) use the resolution result to construct an ArConsumer instance, which may be used to consume the service by exchanging messages with it.
        Type Parameters:
        C - Type of ArConsumer.
        Parameters:
        factory - Class useful for creating ArConsumer instances.
        Returns:
        Future completed with ArConsumer, if service resolution succeeded. If service resolution did not fail but yielded no matching services, the Future is failed with a ServiceNotFoundException.

      • resolveAll

        public Future<java.util.Set<ServiceDescription>> resolveAll()
        Uses resolver provided at instance creation to lookup services matching this query.
        Returns:
        Future completed, if successful, with a set of service descriptions matching this query.

      • resolveOne

        public Future<ServiceDescription> resolveOne()
        Uses resolver provided at instance creation to lookup exactly one service matching this query.
        Returns:
        Future completed, if successful, with exactly one service description matching this query. If no such service could be resolved, the Future is failed with a ServiceNotFoundException.

      • matches

        public boolean matches​(ServiceDescription service)
        Tests whether this query matches the given service description.
        Parameters:
        service - Service description to test.
        Returns:
        true only if the given service satisfies the requirements of this query.
